name: Aeropuerto Internacional de Córdoba
nameEnglish: Ingeniero Aeronáutico Ambrosio L.V. Taravella International Airport
description: The third largest airport in Argentina, Córdoba International is also called Ingeniero Aeronáutico Ambrosio L.V. Taravella Airport. It gets its three-letter code from the city of *Cór*doba.
